scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder comprises letters to Calvin Cogswell Morgan, an assessment for city taxes for Henry P. McGrath and C.C. Morgan, a printed invitation to the "Last Grand Hop of the Season," and two receipts from the New York Opthalmic and Aural Institute. Several letters were written by J.W. George discussing the horse business, a proposal to buy whiskey in which George would be a silent partner, and other business matters. R.W. Woolly wrote three letters discussing politics and a case concerning Henrietta Morgan.
